subject: Golf
United States Open (Golf)
lead_paragraph: OAKMONT, Pa., June 13 — Bubba Watson was taking a break between shots on the practice range at the Oakmont Country Club on Wednesday when the conversation in his entourage of four turned to the rules about putting on the practice green. Watson’s eyes widened when he was told, incorrectly, as it turned out, that golfers would face disqualification if their putts rolled over the blue line separating the practice green from the ninth green.
